teaser: When Brendan interviewed actor and writer Steve Coogan, there was a lot of great conversation that didn’t make it into the broadcast. Take a listen here for Mr. Coogan’s extended notes on religion, his own sense of humor, and cheese.
title: Steve Coogan: Full Interview
